summary.para: Motivated a lot by a passion for innovation and emerging technologies, I decided to persue my recent career to Cloud Architecture.

Experienced professional with a Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering. Initially gained technical skill experiences as a Field Service Engineer in the Medical Diagnostics Industry. Subsequently transitioned into a leadership role within the Cleaning Industry, where I successfully managed operations and implemented process improvements.

Currently leveraging my technical expertise to design, implement, and manage cloud-based solutions for some real-world own projects by Linux, AWS, Git/GitHub, Python, IaC, Orchestration, Containerization, CI/CD, Version Control, Docker.

description.li: AWS services (e.g., EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, CloudFormation, Cloudfront), programming languages (e.g., Python, NodeJS, JavaScript), DevOps tools (e.g., Git, Docker), cloud architecture, software development methodologies.
Cryptocurrency auto trading bot by Python(dYdX Decentralized Platform).
Leadership role in both owned private company and at a Multinational Corporation.
Senior Field Service Engineer serving Medical Diagnostic Equipment.

education.title: HCMC Polytechnic University
education.description: Bachelor Degree as an Electrical Engineer
